data.title: Mika Nakashima
data.meta_description: She is one of the most beautiful singers to ever hit the Japanese market but the irony she first debut as an actress back in 2001.The ex-poser of a Fuji TV drama Kizudarake no Love Song(Tainted Love Song) she beat out 3,000 other girls for the part.She soon would be sign under Sony Music Associated…
data.text:
She is one of the most beautiful singers to ever hit the Japanese market but the irony she first debut as an actress back in 2001.The ex-poser of a Fuji TV drama Kizudarake no Love Song(Tainted Love Song) she beat out 3,000 other girls for the part.She soon would be sign under Sony Music Associated Records and release a single called “Stars” since then the girl has become a household name in Japan.

The biggest role that Mika took and would make her know in other parts of the world.For a manga live action movie called Nana playing the lead role as Nana also going under the name Nana Staring Mika Nakashima.She debut also with the movies main theme song “Glamorous Sky“. A song written by the Nana creator himself Ai Yazawa and composed by with L’Arc- en-cel vocalist Hyde.Nana 2 would also have Mika staring and doing another theme song “Hitoiro”.Written also by Yazawa composed by Glay’s leader Takuro.

Mika thus far has over 10 albums/EPs and release over 29 singles since her debut in 2002 as a singer.Her most recent of albums is No More Rules which features “Blood.” and “My Sugar Cat.” She kick off her tour “Trust Your Voice Tour 2009” and is set release her 30th single “Nagareboshi” the 4th of this November.Also making a collaboration with fashion clothing line Sly called “Candy Girl.”
